columns.name: domain_name
columns.description: The name of the domain.

columns.name: engine_type
columns.description: Specifies the EngineType of the domain.

columns.name: domain_id
columns.description: The id of the domain.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the domain.

columns.name: elasticsearch_version
columns.description: The version for the Elasticsearch domain.

columns.name: endpoint
columns.description: The Elasticsearch domain endpoint that use to submit index and search requests.

columns.name: endpoints
columns.description: The Elasticsearch domain endpoints that use to submit index and search requests.

columns.name: access_policies
columns.description: IAM access policy as a JSON-formatted string.

columns.name: created
columns.description: The domain creation status.

columns.name: deleted
columns.description: The domain deletion status.

columns.name: processing
columns.description: The status of the Elasticsearch domain configuration.

columns.name: upgrade_processing
columns.description: The status of an Elasticsearch domain version upgrade.

columns.name: enabled
columns.description: Specifies the status of the NodeToNodeEncryptionOptions.

columns.name: policy_std
columns.description: Contains the policy in a canonical form for easier searching.

columns.name: ebs_options
columns.description: Specifies whether EBS-based storage is enabled.

columns.name: advanced_options
columns.description: Specifies the status of the AdvancedOptions.

columns.name: advanced_security_options
columns.description: Specifies The current status of the Elasticsearch domain's advanced security options.

columns.name: auto_tune_options
columns.description: The current status of the Elasticsearch domain's Auto-Tune options.

columns.name: cognito_options
columns.description: The CognitoOptions for the specified domain.

columns.name: domain_endpoint_options
columns.description: The current status of the Elasticsearch domain's endpoint options.

columns.name: elasticsearch_cluster_config
columns.description: The type and number of instances in the domain cluster.

columns.name: encryption_at_rest_options
columns.description: Specifies the status of the EncryptionAtRestOptions.

columns.name: log_publishing_options
columns.description: Log publishing options for the given domain.

columns.name: service_software_options
columns.description: The current status of the Elasticsearch domain's service software.

columns.name: snapshot_options
columns.description: Specifies the status of the SnapshotOptions.

columns.name: vpc_options
columns.description: The VPCOptions for the specified domain.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to the domain.
